t: Amazon Ads Launches Brand+, A Way For Marketers To Leverage Shopping, Browsing And Streaming Data From Amazon’s Total Footprint
s: January 27, 2025 - Amazon Ads is rolling out Brand+, a new offering for marketers combining "trillions of signals" from shopping, browsing and streaming across Amazon platforms.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: Create AI-optimized TV advertising campaigns with Brand+ | Amazon Ads

t: Amazon 2025 Updates: AI-Powered Selling, Rufus & Ad Changes
s: April 9, 2025 - Long-Term Sales (LTS) Tracking for Ads (January 4, 2025) Amazon launches new Long-Term Sales (LTS) and LTS ROAS (Return on Ad Spend) metrics for Sponsored Brand (SB) and Sponsored Display (SD) ads. This update will enable measurement of ad performance over time.

t: How Brand+ Will Transform Amazon Advertising Strategy in 2025
